name: 尹世洵
objective: The main objective of learning of mechanics of materials is to provide students with the understanding of mechanical properties of material and the methods of analyzing and designing various structures under different loads.
schedule:
1	course description and introduction of grading policy
2	stress and strain
3	analysis of axially loaded bars 
4	analysis of axially loaded bars
5	analysis of torsion members
6	analysis of torsion members
7	shear and moment in beams
8	stresses in beams
9	mud-term exam
10	stresses in beams
11	deflection of beams
12	deflection of beams
13	analysis of statically indeterminate beams
14	analysis of statically indeterminate beams
15	stresses due to combined loads - plane stress
16	stresses due to combined loads - Mohr's circle 
17	analysis of  cloumns
18   Final exam
scorePolicy:
Evaluation and grading policy
Mid-term exam    50%
Final exam     50%
materials:
Mechanics of materials / Andrew Pytel, Jaan Kiusalaas, Ishan Sharma , 2th edition

材料力學 Mechanics of materials 1/E 原著 Andrew Pytel, Jaan Kiusalaas, Ishan Sharma  譯者 蔡東憲......(高立圖書)
consultation: 上課休息時段與 LINE 群組
